markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3296)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain an item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Antidote (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 546 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 245 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Antidote (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 546 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 35 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Antidote (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 546 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +4 item bonus.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Antidote (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 546 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 675 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +4 item bonus, and when you drink the antidote, you can immediately attempt a save against one poison of 14th level or lower affecting you. If you succeed, the poison is neutralized.
name: Antidote (Major)
